descriptionHtml:
[Epic death metal music begins] A katana crafted from raw Titansteel and bathed in the blood of a thousand Omega demons harvested in fifteen minutes from the darkest of hells from the edgiest of alternate universes by one very bored Unicorn with a slaugher-factory demon farm and a very specific clientèle in mind. This sword can slice easily through flesh and bone and soul alike, and doesn't even need to hit them directly to kill them. Just point it at your target and swing down, and BOOM, you've got yourself some death!

Some people have wondered how many times this was folded. The answer? None. That unicorn NEVER folds. He wants profit, he'll get profit, and he's a vicious little bugger when it comes to killing evil things and profiting from it. I'm not joking. Don't let him near the modding department, ok? We're still recovering from his last visit. And if you're wondering how many times this weapon was folded... None, because Silver never folds.

Because landmarks and clear screenshots aren't enough: IT'S IN FRONT OF RIVERWOOD! IT'S RIGHT IN FRONT OF OBLIVION-DAMNED RIVERWOOD! Walk into Riverwood when you start the game, and POMF, THERE IT IS! IT'S RIGHT! IN! FRONT! OF! RIVERWOOOOOOD-AH! *Guitars explode*
author: Epsilon725 AKA SilverStarApple
